alert.note: Alert for Benton; Cedar; Hickory; St. Clair; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 9:40AM CDT until July 24 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Hickory County in central Missouri... Central Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Benton County in central Missouri... St. Clair County in west central Missouri... Central Vernon County in west central Missouri... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 939 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Clinton to Appleton City to near Rich Hill, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Truman Lake, Pomme de Terre Lake, Nevada, El Dorado Springs, Appleton City, Osceola, Lowry City, Hermitage, Weaubleau, Wheatland, Montevallo, Walker, Schell City, Collins, Roscoe, Vista, Metz, Harwood, Gerster and Quincy. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 85 and 107. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Cedar; Hickory; St. Clair; Vernon
